source: In the event both Custom Block Types and Custom Blocks restrictions are enabled, Custom Block Types restrictions are disregarded.

Please note: since your site uses the Locale module, you will likely need to manually resave each Layout Builder Restriction entity configuration, due to new code that makes Layout Builder Restrictions' configuration multilingual compatible. For more information, see Layout Builder Restrictions version 2.6 release notes.
